title: Soriana Style Sofa 3 Seat
body:
A mid-century design classic originally by Afra and Tobia Scarpa, this Mobelaris style of iconic Soriana 3 Seat Sofas are made from high-quality polyurethane foam, internal hardwood frame and upholstered in various fabrics encapsulated in a highly polished stainless steel frame. This cult classic features its recognizable curved outline and buttoned pleated upholstery design, making it the ideal sofa to lay back and relax.
Perfect when paired with Soriana lounge chair.
